webscript.shortname: Set publish status for a document
webscript.description:
REST API for setting the publish status for a document. The status value is a text value. Only certain users are allowed to set this status which are configured in the alfresco configuration on the value vgr.publishstatus.allowedUsers
Request should look like this:
POST /alfresco/service/vgr/publishstatus/workspace/SpacesStore/143e127f-fe5a-4121-86a3-0cb0d4763837&1364303674884
    POST Parameters: status = text, type = publish / unpublish
